sentences: In the beginning, just getting my form right was really hard.

message:
[알림][오늘의영어]
오늘의 영어 공부 (2026-03-01)

[오늘의 단어]
- lump-sum lease: 전세
- persuade: 설득하다
- struggle: 투쟁하다, 몸부림치다
- clutter: 채우다, 잡동사니
- tendency: 성향, 기질, 동향
- depressed: 우울한, 활기가 없는
- proverb: 속담
- cooperative: 협조하는, 협력하는
- advocate: 지지하다, 옹호자, 변호사

[오늘의 문장]
- I always dreamed of having a place of my own.
- I won an apartment lottery after 22 years.
- I burst into tears.
- Everything is face-paced.
- My heart broke for her.
- In the beginning, just getting my form right was really hard.
